member.name: IGraphicsEffectD2D1Interop.GetEffectId
member.summary: Retrieves the ID of the effect.
member.param: When this method returns, this parameter will contain the ID of the effect.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IGraphicsEffectD2D1Interop.GetNamedPropertyMapping
member.summary: Retrieves the mapping for an effect property.
member.param: When this method returns, this parameter will contain the index of the property.
Indicates how a strongly-typed effect property maps to an underlying Direct2D effect property.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IGraphicsEffectD2D1Interop.GetProperty
member.summary: Retrieves the effect property at the specified index.
member.param: The index of the property to retrieve.
When this method returns, this parameter will contain the retrieved property.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IGraphicsEffectD2D1Interop.GetPropertyCount
member.summary: Retrieve the property count for the effect.
member.param: When the method returns, this parameter will contain the property count.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IGraphicsEffectD2D1Interop.GetSource
member.summary: Retrieves the effect source at the specified index.
member.param: Index of the source the retrieve.
When the method returns, this parameter will contain the source at the specified index.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

member.name: IGraphicsEffectD2D1Interop.GetSourceCount
member.summary: Retrieves the source count for the effect.
member.param: When the method returns, this parameter will contain the source count for the effect.
member.returns: This method returns an HRESULT success or error code.

summary.para: Native interoperation interface that provides a counterpart to IGraphicsEffect and allows for metadata queries.
This interface is available in C++ only.
